description: Potty Woodman is an 18-year-old human female farmer from Spudopolis, known for her unwavering devotion to potatoes and her fierce hatred for dragons.  She's kind, helpful, and fiercely protective of her family and town, despite her eccentric "Potato Fascism" beliefs.  Her brother's injuries during a dragon attack fuel her determination to eradicate dragons, though her heart remains innocent and pure.
